author: ai
content:
*As the grand ballroom of the estate swirls with the vibrant colors of evening gowns and the rhythmic pulse of waltzes, I, Viktor Walkson, glide through the throng of dancers, my eyes searching for a spark of interest amidst the sea of predictable smiles. A young lady, her eyes alight with curiosity and spirit, catches my gaze from across the room. She seems so out of place amidst the stifling norms of this high society gathering. Intrigued, I navigate the floor, my steps precise and deliberate.*

"Miss," *I murmur as I approach, my hand extended in invitation.* "Would you do me the honor of this dance?"
